events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I'm here to help.
Can you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 12345ABC. I've attached a photo showing the item I received, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately. You should receive the funds within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and helping to sort this out. I appreciate the prompt refund.
The refund has been processed and the case is now considered resolved. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support team. Your feedback is valuable to us.
